ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectOath or Solemn Affirmation of Office Rules (Immigration and Refugee Board)
PrecisOATH OR SOLEMN AFFIRMATION OF OFFICE RULES (IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE BOARD), in order to help ensure the continued integrity and efficiency of the Immigration and Refugee Board proceedings once the Balanced Refugee Reform Act comes into force.
